TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExpressionContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供在序列化程式之間傳遞內容狀態的方法。

span.span: Provides a means of passing context state among serializers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 置於內容堆疊，並包含在序列化期間最相關的運算式。An is placed on the context stack and contains the most relevant expression during serialization. 下列 C# 程式碼示範指派。The following C# code demonstrates an assignment. ```csharp button1.Text = "Hello"; ``` 在序列化期間，數個序列化程式會負責建立此單一陳述式。During serialization, several serializers are responsible for creating this single statement. 其中一個序列化程式都會是負責建立"Hello"。One of those serializers is responsible for creating "Hello". 但有些的時候，當序列化程式可能需要知道在其中建立其運算式的內容。There are times when that serializer may need to know the context in which it is creating its expression. 在上述範例中，不需要此內容。In the previous example, this context is not needed. 下列 C# 程式碼顯示環境的知識是必要的狀況。The following C# code shows a situation in which knowledge of the context is necessary. ```csharp button1.Text = rm.GetString("button1_Text"); ``` 在此情況下，序列化程式負責建立資源運算式必須收到通知的目標物件的名稱。In this case, the serializer responsible for creating the resource expression needs to be informed of the names of the target objects. 類別可以用這個。The class can be used for this. 每個序列化程式會建立一個運算式，並叫用序列化程式來處理整個陳述式的一小部分，序列化程式將內容堆疊上推入運算式內容。As each serializer creates an expression and invokes a serializer to handle a smaller part of the statement as a whole, the serializer pushes an expression context on the context stack. 每個運算式內容都有一個在堆疊找出下一個運算式內容的父屬性。Each expression context has a parent property that locates the next expression context on the stack. 這提供方便的周遊功能。This provides a convenient traversal capability.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用以判斷指派給運算式時，是否需要轉型。You can use to determine if a cast is needed when assigning to the expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果運算式的屬性參考屬性的執行個體呼叫`button1`，傳回`button1`。If the expression is a property reference to the property of an instance of called `button1`, returns `button1`.
